name: A Horsey Halloween: A Dweller's Empty Path Parody Halloween Hack for Halloween
name_original: A Horsey Halloween: A Dweller's Empty Path Parody Halloween Hack for Halloween
description:
a foal when she gets turned into a horse! What will she do know? You'd better giddy up and trick-or-treat for the seven magical pumpkins that will help cure you or else it'll be a long night on the old dusty trail!

BENEFITS OF DOWNLOADING THIS GAME

  • YOU GET TO BE A HORSE
  • EVERYONE LOVES HORSES
  • HORSES GET TO GO FAST
  • HAY IS DELICIOUS!
  • YOU DONT HAVE TO ASK YOUR PARENTS TO GET YOU A PONY BECAUSE YOU CAN MAKE YOUR OWN
  • MABLE MABLE STRONG AND ABLE KEEP THOSE ELBOWS ON THE TABLE CAUSE THIS IS DEFINITELY A HORSE'S STABLE!!!!!!

BENEFITS OF NOT DOWNLOADING THIS GAME

  • You don't have to worry about being turned into glue?

HERE'S A VIDEO!

Horsey Halloween is a Parody Hack of Dweller's Empty Path by Temmie Chang, but it's okay if you haven't played that! This game was written for people who are completely unfamiliar! That being said, I do not own the characters. If you would like a donation, please make one to Temmie Chang on her page!
